short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can easily obtain the color Hex, RGB or HSL of any element on the screen, whether it's text, images, buttons, or backgrounds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can obtain the hexadecimal, RGB or HSL value of any pixel on the screen or from the color palette. The value remains saved even if you close the browser, and you can click a button to copy the value and paste it wherever you desire.
